verses.verse: For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and will yet choose <S%H977><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and set <S%H3240><s%> them in their own land. <S%H127><s%> The foreigner <S%H1616><s%> will join <S%H3867><s%> himself with them, <S%H5596><s%> and they will unite with the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

The peoples <S%H5971><s%> will take <S%H3947><s%> them, <S%H935><s%> and bring them to their place. <S%H4725><s%> The house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will possess <S%H5157><s%> them in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s land <S%H127><s%> for servants <S%H5650><s%> and for handmaids. <S%H8198><s%> They will take as captives <S%H7617><s%> those whose captives <S%H7617><s%> they were; <S%H7287><s%> and they shall rule over their oppressors. <S%H5065><s%>

It will happen in the day <S%H3117><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will give you rest <S%H5117><s%> from your sorrow, <S%H6090><s%> from your trouble, <S%H6090><s%> and from the hard <S%H7186><s%> service <S%H5656><s%> in which you were made to serve, <S%H5647><s%>

that you will take up <S%H5375><s%> this parable <S%H4912><s%> against the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> "How the oppressor <S%H5065><s%> has ceased! <S%H7673><s%> The golden city <S%H4062><s%> has ceased! <S%H7673><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has broken <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of the rulers, <S%H4910><s%>

who struck <S%H5221><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> in wrath <S%H5678><s%> with a continual <S%H1115><s%> stroke, <S%H4347><s%> who ruled <S%H7287><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> in anger, <S%H639><s%> with a persecution <S%H4783><s%> that none <S%H1097><s%> restrained. <S%H2820><s%>
The whole earth <S%H776><s%> is at rest, <S%H5117><s%> and is quiet. <S%H8252><s%> They break out <S%H6476><s%> song. <S%H7440><s%>

Yes, <S%H1265><s%> the fir trees rejoice <S%H8055><s%> with you, <S%H730><s%> with the cedars of Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> saying, <S%H7901><s%> "Since you are humbled, no lumberjack <S%H3772><s%> has come up against us. <S%H5927><s%>"

Sheol <S%H7585><s%> from beneath has moved <S%H7264><s%> for you to meet <S%H7125><s%> you at your coming. <S%H935><s%> It stirs up <S%H5782><s%> the dead <S%H7496><s%> for you, <S%H6260><s%> even all the rulers of the earth. <S%H776><s%> It has raised up <S%H6965><s%> from their thrones <S%H3678><s%> all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
They all will answer <S%H6030><s%> and ask <S%H559><s%> you, <S%H2470><s%> "Have you also become as weak as we are? <S%H4911><s%> Have you become like us?"

Your pomp <S%H1347><s%> is brought down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> with the sound <S%H1998><s%> of your stringed instruments. <S%H5035><s%> Maggots <S%H7415><s%> are spread <S%H3331><s%> out under you, <S%H7415><s%> and worms cover you. <S%H4374><s%>

How you have fallen <S%H5307><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> morning star, <S%H1966><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of the dawn! <S%H7837><s%> How you are cut down <S%H1438><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> who laid the nations <S%H1471><s%> low! <S%H2522><s%>

You said <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> "I will ascend <S%H5927><s%> into heaven! <S%H8064><s%> I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> my throne <S%H3678><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> the stars <S%H3556><s%> of God! <S%H410><s%> I will sit <S%H3427><s%> on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of assembly, <S%H4150><s%> in the far <S%H3411><s%> north! <S%H6828><s%>
I will ascend <S%H5927><s%> above the heights <S%H1116><s%> of the clouds! <S%H5645><s%> I will make myself like <S%H1819><s%> the Most High! <S%H5945><s%>"
Yet you shall be brought down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> to the depths <S%H3411><s%> of the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Those who see <S%H7200><s%> you will stare <S%H7688><s%> at you. <S%H995><s%> They will ponder you, <S%H376><s%> saying, "Is this the man who made the earth <S%H776><s%> to tremble, <S%H7264><s%> who shook <S%H7493><s%> kingdoms; <S%H4467><s%>

who made <S%H7760><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> like a wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and overthrew <S%H2040><s%> its cities; <S%H5892><s%> who didn't <S%H6605><s%> release his prisoners <S%H615><s%> to their home? <S%H1004><s%>"
All the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> sleep <S%H7901><s%> in glory, <S%H3519><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> in his own house. <S%H1004><s%>

But you are cast away <S%H7993><s%> from your tomb <S%H6913><s%> like an abominable <S%H8581><s%> branch, <S%H5342><s%> clothed <S%H3830><s%> with the slain, <S%H2026><s%> who are thrust through <S%H2944><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> who go down <S%H3381><s%> to the stones <S%H68><s%> of the pit; <S%H953><s%> like a dead body <S%H6297><s%> trodden under foot. <S%H947><s%>

You will not join <S%H3161><s%> them in burial, <S%H6900><s%> because you have destroyed <S%H7843><s%> your land. <S%H776><s%> You have killed <S%H2026><s%> your people. <S%H5971><s%> The seed <S%H2233><s%> of evildoers <S%H7489><s%> will not be named <S%H7121><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

Prepare <S%H3559><s%> for slaughter <S%H4293><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> because of the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> that they not <S%H1077><s%> rise <S%H6965><s%> up and possess <S%H3423><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> with cities. <S%H6145><s%>

"I will rise up <S%H6965><s%> against them, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "and cut off <S%H3772><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> and remnant, <S%H7605><s%> and son <S%H5209><s%> and son <S%H5220><s%>'s son," says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"I will also make <S%H7760><s%> it a possession <S%H4180><s%> for the porcupine, <S%H7090><s%> and pools <S%H98><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%> I will sweep <S%H2894><s%> it with the broom <S%H4292><s%> of destruction, <S%H8045><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has sworn, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Surely, <S%H1819><s%> as I have thought, so shall it happen; <S%H3289><s%> and as I have purposed, so shall it stand: <S%H6965><s%>

that I will break <S%H7665><s%> the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> in my land, <S%H776><s%> and tread him under foot <S%H947><s%> on my mountains. <S%H2022><s%> Then his yoke <S%H5923><s%> will leave <S%H5493><s%> them, <S%H5448><s%> and his burden leave <S%H5493><s%> their shoulders. <S%H7926><s%>

This is the plan <S%H3289><s%> that is determined <S%H3289><s%> for the whole earth. <S%H776><s%> This is the hand <S%H3027><s%> that is stretched out <S%H5186><s%> over all the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has planned, <S%H3289><s%> and who can stop <S%H6565><s%> it? <S%H3027><s%> His hand is stretched out, <S%H5186><s%> and who can turn it back? <S%H7725><s%>"
This burden <S%H4853><s%> was in the year <S%H8141><s%> that king <S%H4428><s%> Ahaz <S%H271><s%> died. <S%H4194><s%>

Don't <S%H8055><s%> rejoice, O Philistia, <S%H6429><s%> all of you, <S%H7626><s%> because the rod that struck <S%H5221><s%> you is broken; <S%H7665><s%> for out <S%H3318><s%> of the serpent <S%H5175><s%>'s root <S%H8328><s%> an adder <S%H6848><s%> will emerge, <S%H6529><s%> and his fruit will be a fiery <S%H8314><s%> flying <S%H5774><s%> serpent. <S%H8314><s%>

The firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the poor <S%H1800><s%> will eat, <S%H7462><s%> and the needy <S%H34><s%> will lie down <S%H7257><s%> in safety; <S%H983><s%> and I will kill <S%H4191><s%> your root <S%H8328><s%> with famine, <S%H7458><s%> and your remnant <S%H7611><s%> will be killed. <S%H2026><s%>

Howl, <S%H3213><s%> gate! <S%H8179><s%> Cry, <S%H2199><s%> city! <S%H5892><s%> You are melted <S%H4127><s%> away, <S%H6429><s%> Philistia, all of you; <S%H6227><s%> for smoke comes <S%H935><s%> out of the north, <S%H6828><s%> and there is no straggler <S%H909><s%> in his ranks. <S%H4151><s%>

What will they answer <S%H6030><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of the nation? <S%H1471><s%> That Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has founded <S%H3245><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and in her the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%> will take refuge. <S%H2620><s%>
